title: Cheap and easy sausage and baked bean pie
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) plain flour', '50g (2 oz) butter', '1 pinch of salt', '2 tablespoons cold water', '1 medium to large onion', '5 medium sized white mushrooms', 'a small amount cooking oil', '8 sausages', '2 standard tins baked beans', '2 dessertspoons tomato puree', '1 teaspoon garlic puree', 'a small amount milk or 1 egg']
